3D Printing Materials

We support the following materials for our P1S and A1 series printers:

  • PLA
  • PETG HF
  • TPU 85A
  • TPU 90A
  • TPU 95A HF
  • PLA Glow
  • PLA-CF
  • PETG-CF
  • ABS
  • ABS-GF
  • ASA
  • ASA-CF
  • PA6-CF
  • PA6-GF
  • PAHT-CF
  • PET-CF
  • PPA-CF
  • PC
  • PC FR
  • PVA

If your order requires special tools or nozzles that we do not currently have, we will notify you and bill accordingly.

Note: Our 3D printing services are currently available to customers within the United Kingdom only.
